attributes.action: Cancel A level exams 2021! It's unfair
attributes.additional_details: Teaches are trying to squeeze in modules we missed from lockdown into the small amount of time we have. It's literally impossible to understand anything. Who's the ones that are going to complain about having a shortage of doctors and nurses in the future? We are the year group that going to sit exams and not get the grades we want because of the amount of content we have missed. Were not going to get onto the courses we want at uni. We are eventually going to be part of the working sector!
attributes.background: Cancel a levels 2021! The amount of content that we have to learn is already ridiculous. On top of this, we have missed 6 MONTHS worth of education! We dont all have access to Internet and computers. Work set by schools were not useful or helpful in any way. We should be able to get our predicted!
